body: Burundi plans to hold nationwide talks on the press and the new information and communication technology next month: "Its objective would be to look into the big challenges of material, financial, legal and administrative challenges facing media professionals in the country."
original_body: Burundi plans to hold nationwide talks on the press and the new information and communication technology next month: "Its objective would be to look into the big challenges of material, financial, legal and administrative challenges facing media professionals in the country."
title: Burundi: Nation-wide forum on media and ICT next month

sentence: Burundi plans to hold nationwide talks on the press and the new information and communication technology next month: "Its objective would be to look into the big challenges of material, financial, legal and administrative challenges facing media professionals in the country."
